segments.text: Welcome , sir . What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: May I have a look at that china tea set ? It is extremely beautiful .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You've made a good choice . This china tea set is unusual . It was made in Jingdezhen .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Jingdezhen ? Oh , I know it . Isn't it called the capital of porcelain ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , it must be very precious . Is it breakable ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , if you take some care when you use them .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , it is beyond my purse .
segments.speaker: S2
